code: import React,{createContext,useState}from'react';import orderService from'../services/orderService';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const OrderContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const OrderProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);const fetchOrders=async()=>{const userOrders=await orderService.getOrders();setOrders(userOrders);};const placeOrder=async orderData=>{const newOrder=await orderService.placeOrder(orderData);setOrders(prev=>[...prev,newOrder]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OrderContext.Provider,{value:{orders,fetchOrders,placeOrder},children:children});};
